uts.wsd.teamtwo

Class ReviewsApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.GenericApplication<Reviews>
      • uts.wsd.teamtwo.ReviewsApplication

  • public class ReviewsApplication
extends GenericApplication<Reviews>
    The DAO which exposes functionality for manipulating and accessing the Reviews database
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies

      • postReview

        public void postReview(Review review)
        Add a new review to the underlying database and update the database to include the new review.
        Parameters:
        review - The new review to add to the database

      • deleteReview

        public void deleteReview(Review review)
        Removes a review from the underlying database and updates the database.
        Parameters:
        review - The review to delete from the database

      • filterById

        public Reviews filterById(int id)
        Filters the set of reviews by an ID. One review will remain in the collection.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the review to find
        Returns:
        A collection of reviews containing only the review with the given ID

      • getReviewsForHotel

        public Reviews getReviewsForHotel(Hotel hotel)
        Obtains the collection of reviews that were published for the given hotel.
        Parameters:
        hotel - The hotel whose reviews to find
        Returns:
        The reviews that were published for the given hotel
        See Also:
        Hotel

      • getReviewsForHotel

        Parameters:
        hotelId - The ID of the hotel whose reviews to find
        Returns:
        The reviews that were published for the given hotel
        See Also:
        Hotel
